verses.verse: וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they took their journey מֵֽאֵילִ֔ם <S%H362><s%> me-'ei-Lim, from Elim וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u came כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all עֲדַ֤ת <S%H5712><s%> 'a-Dat and all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> mid-bar- unto the wilderness סִ֔ין <S%H5512><s%> Sin, of Sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> bein- is between אֵילִ֖ם <S%H362><s%> 'ei-Lim which [is] between Elim וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein is between סִינָ֑י <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai; and Sinai בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H2568><s%> ba-cha-mish-Shah fif עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen יוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> yOm day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, of the second לְצֵאתָ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> le-tze-Tam after their departing out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וַיִּלִּינוּ vai-yil-li-nu כוַיִּלֹּ֜ונוּ <S%H3885><s%> vai-yil-Lo-nu abide קכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole עֲדַ֧ת <S%H5712><s%> 'a-Dat And the whole congregation בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh against Moses וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- against אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar. in the wilderness

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem about בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- any יִתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten add מוּתֵ֤נוּ <S%H4191><s%> mu-Te-nu we had died בְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> ve-yad- by the hand יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt בְּשִׁבְתֵּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> be-shiv-Te-nu when we sat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by סִ֣יר <S%H5518><s%> sir pots הַבָּשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> hab-ba-Sar, by the flesh בְּאָכְלֵ֥נוּ <S%H398><s%> be-'a-che-Le-nu [and] when we did eat לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem bread לָשֹׂ֑בַע <S%H7648><s%> la-Soa'; to the full כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הוֹצֵאתֶ֤ם <S%H3318><s%> ho-tze-Tem for ye have brought us forth אֹתָ֙נוּ֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ta-nu אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַמִּדְבָּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Bar into this wilderness הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this לְהָמִ֛ית <S%H4191><s%> le-ha-Mit to kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- whole הַקָּהָ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal this whole assembly הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this בָּרָעָֽב׃ <S%H7458><s%> ba-ra-'Av. with hunger ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold מַמְטִ֥יר <S%H4305><s%> mam-Tir Behold I will rain לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem bread מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; from heaven וְיָצָ֨א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza shall go out הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am for you and the people וְלָֽקְטוּ֙ <S%H3950><s%> ve-la-ke-Tu and gather דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- a certain rate י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom A day's בְּיוֹמ֔וֹ <S%H3117><s%> be-yo-Mo, day לְמַ֧עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because of אֲנַסֶּ֛נּוּ <S%H5254><s%> 'a-nas-Sen-nu that I may prove הֲיֵלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-ye-Lech will walk בְּתוֹרָתִ֖י <S%H8451><s%> be-to-ra-Ti in my law אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- or לֹֽא׃ <S%H3808><s%> Lo. not

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <S%H8345><s%> hash-shish-Shi, And it shall come to pass that on the sixth וְהֵכִ֖ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> ve-he-Chi-nu they shall prepare אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- [that] which יָבִ֑יאוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vi-'u; they bring in וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become מִשְׁנֶ֔ה <S%H4932><s%> mish-Neh, and it shall be twice עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al as אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- much יִלְקְט֖וּ <S%H3950><s%> yil-ke-Tu as much as they gather י֥וֹם׀ <S%H3117><s%> Yom daily יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> Yom. day ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> ve-'a-ha-Ron, and Aaron אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel עֶ֕רֶב <S%H6153><s%> 'E-rev At even וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem then ye shall know כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> ki that יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD הוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> ho-Tzi hath brought you out אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz from the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וּבֹ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> u-Vo-ker, And in the morning וּרְאִיתֶם֙ <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'i-Tem then ye shall see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> ke-Vod the glory יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD בְּשָׁמְע֥וֹ <S%H8085><s%> be-sha-me-'O for that he heareth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- תְּלֻנֹּתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H8519><s%> te-lun-no-tei-Chem your murmurings עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; against the LORD וְנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H5168><s%> ve-Nach-nu and what [are] we מָ֔ה <S%H4100><s%> Mah, and what כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for; תַלֹּונוּ tal-lo-nu כתַלִּ֖ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> tal-Li-nu abide קעָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu. against

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses בְּתֵ֣ת <S%H5414><s%> be-Tet shall give יְהוָה֩ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [This shall be] when the LORD לָכֶ֨ם la-Chem בָּעֶ֜רֶב <S%H6153><s%> ba-'E-rev you in the evening בָּשָׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> ba-Sar flesh לֶאֱכֹ֗ל <S%H398><s%> le-'e-Chol, to eat וְלֶ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> ve-Le-chem bread בַּבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker and in the morning לִשְׂבֹּ֔עַ <S%H7646><s%> lis-Bo-a', to the full בִּשְׁמֹ֤עַ <S%H8085><s%> bish-Mo-a' heareth יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- תְּלֻנֹּ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H8519><s%> te-lun-No-tei-Chem, your murmurings אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem are we מַלִּינִ֖ם <S%H8519><s%> mal-li-Nim your grumblings עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav; against וְנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H5168><s%> ve-Nach-nu we מָ֔ה <S%H4100><s%> Mah, and what לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- are not עָלֵ֥ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu against תְלֻנֹּתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H8519><s%> te-lun-no-tei-Chem your grumblings כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki but עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. [are] not against us but against the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, unto Aaron אֱמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor, Say אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עֲדַת֙ <S%H5712><s%> 'a-Dat unto all the congregation בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel קִרְב֖וּ <S%H7126><s%> kir-Vu Come near לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for שָׁמַ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma', for he hath heard אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et תְּלֻנֹּתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H8519><s%> te-lun-no-tei-Chem. your murmurings

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came כְּדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> ke-dab-Ber spake אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron And it came to pass as Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- to the whole עֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> 'a-Dat unto the whole congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיִּפְנ֖וּ <S%H6437><s%> vai-yif-Nu that they looked אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward הַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Bar; toward the wilderness וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> ke-Vod and behold the glory יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD נִרְאָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> nir-'Ah appeared בֶּעָנָֽן׃ <S%H6051><s%> be-'a-Nan. in the cloud פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ti, I have heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- תְּלוּנֹּת֮ <S%H8519><s%> te-lun-Not the murmurings בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel דַּבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber speak אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem to לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, unto them saying בֵּ֤ין <S%H996><s%> bein At הָֽעַרְבַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H6153><s%> ha-'ar-Ba-yim twilight תֹּאכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> to-che-Lu ye shall eat בָשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> va-Sar, flesh וּבַבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> u-vab-Bo-ker and in the morning תִּשְׂבְּעוּ־ <S%H7646><s%> tis-be-'u- ye shall be filled לָ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> La-chem; with bread וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בָעֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> va-'E-rev, And it came to pass that at even וַתַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> vat-Ta-'al came up הַשְּׂלָ֔ו <S%H7958><s%> has-se-Lav, the quails וַתְּכַ֖ס <S%H3680><s%> vat-te-Chas and covered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh; the camp וּבַבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> u-vab-Bo-ker, and in the morning הָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah came שִׁכְבַ֣ת <S%H7902><s%> shich-Vat lay הַטַּ֔ל <S%H2919><s%> hat-Tal, the dew סָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv round about לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> Lam-ma-cha-Neh. the host
